channel.title: Fraud on Jared Monger

item.title: Benford's Law
item.description: My wife tells me my blog is boring because it doesn't have enough pictures…and also it's about accounting. So, with that in mind, I am prepared to blow your mind with this post, pictures and all. Benford's Law. Who's heard of it? Anybody. Anybody. Bueller…. This is Benford's Law. What, equations don't do it for you? Well then, let's dive in. Benford's Law is one of those things that can be proven mathematically, but flies in the face of common sense.
